purpose: To provide a framework for building and managing multi-agent systems for various computational tasks
principle: Builds on agent-based architecture to allow coordination and communication between multiple specialized agents
reusability: Offers a modular framework with APIs for integrating custom agents and extending functionality
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited documentation and potential stability issues
name: open-operator
description: Open-source resources on agents for computer use.
highlight: Facilitates the orchestration and management of multiple AI agents for complex tasks
